div.div:
0- Quelles sont les regles ? j'ai que d'un diagrame CMMN !
1- How can figure out if the customer is browsing for pleasure or for information ?
2- How can I get the email of Alex (to send him the recommended products) without asking him to login/subscribe ?
3- How can I give personnalised recommendation to Alex without knowing him ?
4- How to know if a customer is targeting a particular product ?
5- PS: I tried to use google analytics, bit I need a public deployed website.
6- How the CMMN engine know which task to execute: T3, T5 or T8 ? and how can i know ?

switch.text: 0- Quelles sont les regles ? j'ai que d'un...

div.div:
1- Frontend send an HTTP Post request to backend to start (or resume) the workflow. The request must have the customer infos as input.
2- After 5 seconds, the workflow asssign the stage of Unknown and the BrowsingType of Pleasure to the workflow metadata.
3- Send a websocket message from the backend to the frontend to invite the customer to subscribe.
4- send an HTTP Post request from the frontend to the backend to signal if the customer has been logged in succefully or not.
5- The workflow change the Stage to Desire and send a websocket message to the frontend requesting a communication with chatbot with the customer.
6- Send an HTTP Post request from the frontend to the backend to signal if the customer has responded ot not and if he is targeting a specific product or not.
7- If the customer didn't respond, the workflow get blocked in the Desire stage until he target a particular product.
8- Send an HTTP Post request to the workflow if the customer mark a product as favorite and change the stage to Intention.
9- Send a websocket message from the backend to the frontend requesting it to recommend similar product or personnalized recommedation.

switch.text: 1- Frontend send an HTTP Post request to backend to start (or resume) the...
